description: [CHIMNEYSWEEP](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S1149) can use an embedded RC4 key to decrypt Windows API function strings.(Citation: Mandiant ROADSWEEP August 2022)

external_references.description: Jenkins, L. at al. (2022, August 4). ROADSWEEP Ransomware - Likely Iranian Threat Actor Conducts Politically Motivated Disruptive Activity Against Albanian Government Organizations. Retrieved August 6, 2024.
